chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) (t : term), lifted_committed net e t -> committed (mgv_deghost net) e t

Premises:
mgv_deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map mgv_deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in nwState0 end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments mgv_deghost {base_params multi_params msg_ghost_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
lifted_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ lifted_directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> term -> Prop
term = nat : Set
ghost_log_network = network : Type
committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> entry -> term -> Prop Arguments committed {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
transitive_commit = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> committed net e' t -> committed net e t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments transitive_commit {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_directly_committed_directly_committed : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry), lifted_directly_committed net e -> directly_committed (mgv_deghost net) e
commit_invariant_nw = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (lid : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (lci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t lid pli plt es lci -> In e (fst (pBody p)) -> eIndex e <= lci -> lifted_committed net e t : ghost_log_network -> Prop
msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e
commit_recorded_committed = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), commit_recorded (deghost net) h e -> committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded_committed {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_invariant_host = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> lifted_committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
in_mgv_ghost_packet : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> In (mgv_deghost_packet p) (nwPackets (mgv_deghost net))
eTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, _, eTerm, _) := e in eTerm : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> term Arguments eTerm {orig_base_params raft_params}
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
allEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : electionsData) => let (_, _, _, _, allEntries) := e in allEntries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), electionsData -> list (term * entry) Arguments allEntries {orig_base_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntries_log_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st /\ log st' = log st \/ leaderId st' <> None /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ commitIndex st' = Init.Nat.max (commitIndex st) (Init.Nat.min ci (maxIndex es)) /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ t >= currentTerm st /\ log st' = es /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) =...
lifted_maxIndex_sanity_append_entries : forall (xs : list ghost_log_packet) (p : ghost_log_packet) (ys : list ghost_log_packet) (net : ghost_log_network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list ghost_log_packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci ->...-> lifted_maxIndex_sanity {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
all_the_way_deghost_spec : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name), snd (nwState net h) = nwState (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h
lifted_directly_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) => exists quorum : list Net.name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : Net.name, In h quorum -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> Prop
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix removeAfterIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if eIndex e <=? i then e :: es else removeAfterIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments removeAfterIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
sorted = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix sorted (log : list entry) : Prop := match log with | [] => True | e :: es => (forall e' : entry, In e' es -> eIndex e > eIndex e' /\ eTerm e >= eTerm e') /\ sorted es end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> Prop Arguments sorted {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record raft_msg_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface { msg_refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net) } Arguments raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
maxTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxTerm (entries : list entry) : term := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eTerm e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> term Arguments maxTerm {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> terms_and_indices_from_one entries : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> logs_sorted net } Arguments sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_sorted_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _)%function_scope
msg_lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)

```coq
intros net e t H.
unfold committed, mgv_deghost, lifted_committed in *.
destruct H as (h & e' & H0 & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4).
exists h, e'.
split; [|split; [|split]]; auto.
- apply lifted_directly_committed_directly_committed, H1.
- apply commit_invariant_nw, H4; auto.
- apply commit_recorded_committed, msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro; auto.
Qed.

original: intros net e t H. unfold committed, mgv_deghost, lifted_committed in *. destruct H as (h & e' & H0 & H1 & H2 & H3 & H4). exists h, e'. split; [|split; [|split]]; auto. - apply lifted_directly_committed_directly_committed, H1. - apply commit_invariant_nw, H4; auto. - apply commit_recorded_committed, msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro; auto.
